channel.title: Webclient
channel.description:
Could some one help me make a webclient please, i'v tryed following quite a few tutorials and non of them seem to work.
If anyone can help me out on here please leave a message
the base is dspk

item.title: Webclient
item.dc:creator: @i_fail_serv i fail serv
item.description:
@i_fail_serv wrote:

dskp has webclient already you need only .jar it and change the Cache downloader from client.java and cachedownloader.java the download link [cache download link]

and you need go singlink. search

public static String findcachedir() {
        String as[] = {"./cache/"};

replace with

 public static String findcachedir() {
        String as[] = {"C:/"};

and this under have

if(storeid < 32 || storeid > 34)
            storeid = 32;
        String s = "blaa blaa";

change the name to your server name and search with “senconddir()” and you will see like this… change the name

public static String sencondDir() {
		File file = new File("C:/blaa blaa/");

Read full topic
